metadata.summary: Ingest AWS CloudTrail logs via S3 bucket or SQS queue to monitor AWS deployments and detect abuse
metadata.primary_use_case: Monitor AWS account activity and detect unauthorized access or configuration changes

extracted_apis.description: Create S3 adapter for AWS CloudTrail logs with bucket_name, access_key, secret_key parameters
Create SQS adapter for AWS CloudTrail logs with queue_url, region, access_key, secret_key parameters

cross_refs.description: S3 adapter type used to collect CloudTrail logs from S3 buckets
SQS adapter type used to collect CloudTrail logs from SQS queues
